channel.title: Portalpkz || custom server || looking for staff!
channel.description:
Do you love custom servers? Well the staff and players are inviting to try out our rapidly growing custom built server!
We have many custom items such as: Drygor Chaotic Many different coloured Party Hats, Whips, Santa hats and Halloween masks Term Torva Energy Sword Ares Armour Oblitary sword and many more custom weapons!
There are many bosses/ mini game including: Nex Waterfiends (drops Quad XP ring, Double XP ring, Ring of Wealth and even 2b, 1b, 500m and 100m, Caskets) Sea Troll Queen Lakhrahnaz Nomad Giant Sea Snake Avatar Of Destruction Godwars King Black Dragon Dagganoth Kings Corporal Beast
With such a quickly growing server we need more players to maintain the stability in our economy, so the owner of the server (Attack) will be hiring professional staff members. But with all that there is to do on this server you'll have your daily enjoyment with the help of our amazing staff and players of the server, never forget that there is always experienced players to assist you with any difficulties. We hope to see you there!
Come join us today at PortalPkzrsps.weebly.com/ ~Kaydhd
